ing: 1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese food, diced
1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can beer, room temperature
des: "Bring the Beer Cheese Dip, and go home with an empty bowl! This is very simple to prepare. Serve it with your favorite warm bread."
ins: In a medium bowl, whip together cream cheese, processed cheese food, beer and garlic. Continue whipping until smooth.
